name: Custom Forgot Password Mail
author: Galaxyweblinks

sections.description:
The Custom Forgot Password Mail plugin for WordPress is a free tool that lets you send personalized emails to users when they attempt to reset their passwords.

Manage your users efficiently

Customize your recovery emails:

Boost user engagement on your WordPress site by providing clear, easy-to-follow instructions in your recovery emails with the Custom Forgot Password Mail plugin!
Many users appreciate immediate support.

The Custom Forgot Password Mail plugin is developed and maintained by Galaxy Weblinks a technology company dedicated to delivering high-quality products at affordable prices on time.
sections.installation:
Plugin Installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory of your WordPress site,
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress,
  3. Visit the “Custom Forgot Password Mail” administration page to setup the plugin.
sections.faq:
Do I have to add template tags to my theme?

You should not have to change your templates.
The Custom Forgot Mail seamlessly integrates into your blog by using predefined hooks.

Do not hesitate to contact us at www.galaxyweblinks.com if you need further assistance.

Where can I report bugs, leave my feedback and get support?

Our team answers your questions at:
https://www.galaxyweblinks.com/contact/
